description:
Precise amounts of complete electrolytes and clean carbohydrates delivered with the satisfyingly sour sweetness of lemons and lime. Nuun’s Endurance line has been engineered for endurance athletes and those all-day suffer fests. Providing a balanced ratio of ingredients that can be fully absorbed during long workouts, letting you focus on that next PR, not a growling tummy.

  • Designed for workouts longer than 90 minutes
  • Flavoured with real dried fruit powder
  • Ingredients: cane sugar, dextrose, sodium citrate, citric acid, organic natural flavors, potassium citrate, potassium chloride, magnesium citrate and calcium citrate
name: Nuun Endurance Lemon Lime Hydration Drink Mix
